quote: There are no accidents.
Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
My friend, the panda will never fulfill his destiny, nor you yours, until you let go of the illusion of control.

Quit, don't quit. Noodles, don't noodles... You are too concerned with what was and what will be. There's a saying: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
The secret ingredient is... nothing!
To make something special you just have to believe it's special.
There is no secret ingredient.
I'm not a big fat panda. I'm THE big fat panda.
Skadoosh!
There is no charge for awesomeness... or attractiveness.
Legend tells of a legendary warrior whose kung fu skills were the stuff of legend.
He was so deadly, in fact, that his enemies would go blind from over-exposure to pure awesomeness!
Your story may not have such a happy beginning, but that doesn't make you who you are. It is the rest of your story, who you choose to be.
Scars heal.
No they don't. Wounds heal.
You gotta let go of that stuff from the past because it just doesn't matter. The only thing that matters is what you choose to be now.
How can kung fu stop something that stops kung fu?
Ah. My old enemy... stairs!
I'm not freaking out, I'm freaking in.
The only thing that matters is what you choose to be now.
If you only do what you can do, you'll never be better than what you are.
But I like who I am!
You don't even know who you are!
When will you realize? The more you take, the less you have.
Time is just an illusion, there is only the now.
I am not trying to turn you into me, I am turning you into you.
Sometimes we do the wrong things for the good reasons.
I've been asking myself that question. Am I the son of a panda? The son of a goose? A student? A teacher? I'm all of those things. I am the Dragon Warrior!
Now, who wants to do the right thing for the wrong reasons?
That is awesome! I mean, it's disturbing, but it's awesome!
I'm only hungry for one thing... Vengeance!
Worrying doesn't make the broth boil any faster.
Oogway made a mistake choosing you as the Dragon Warrior. I just didn't realize how big a mistake it was until now.
